description: With V7’s Multimedia Value Speakers System, you can enjoy top-quality audio performance at a bargain price. The system, which is part of V7 Private Label’s new line of PC Speakers, provides 15.5W RMS of audio output and comes with a remote for easy volume control. Stylish silver accents on the glossy black wood casings create a sleek, modern look.
title: V7 A321V-N6 2.1 Multimedia Value PC Speaker System
